As with every operating system there are: Kao u svakom operativnom sistemu, i ovdje imate nekoliko stvari sa kojima trebate da se upoznate. Ova sekcija će vam pomoći da savladate jednostavne svakodnevne zadatke kao što su pretraživanje interneta i slušanje muzike i daće vam neke korisne informacije kojih možda niste svjesni.
The elementary OS desktop is very simple: elementary OS desktop je vrlo jednostavan i lako se nauči. Sastoji se od dva elementa: panela i doka. Pozadinu možete da promijenite tako što otvorite Postavke sistema → Desktop → Pozadina.
At the top of the screen you can see the: Na vrhu vašeg ekrana ćete vidjeti Panel. Na lijevoj strani se otvara meni sa aplikacijama, u sredini se nalazi datum i vrijeme, a na desnoj strani se nalaze indikatori
On the left side of the panel is the App: On the left side of the panel is the Applications item. Clicking Applications brings up a launcher with all of your installed apps. You can view multiple pages of apps using the pagers at the bottom or by scrolling. You can also use the view switcher at the top to switch between a grid view and a category view.
You can search for apps by name or by ke: You can search for apps by name or by keyword and perform actions associated with them. You can also search for system settings panes. Some of the actions you can find in search include:
To open the applications menu with the k:
To open the applications menu with the keyboard, press ⌘ + space/kbd>.

Indicators

On the right side of the panel are icons called Indicators. These tell you of the current status of your session, i.e. your network connections, battery power, time, chat and email accounts, etc. Clicking an indicator exposes more information and related actions.

The Dock

At the bottom of the screen is the Dock. It contains your favorite apps well as any apps that are currently open.

The contents of the dock are easily customizable. To add an app to the dock, drag and drop it from Applications on the panel or right-click an open app's icon and choose Keep in Dock. To remove an app from the dock, drag it off and drop it in an empty space on your desktop or right-click the icon and uncheck Keep in Dock. To rearrange apps on the dock, simply drag and drop them.

By default, the dock hides off the bottom of the screen when an app is maximized. Simply move your mouse to the bottom center of the screen to reveal the dock.

You can customize the dock's behavior through System Settings → Desktop → Dock.

App Windows

Apps exist in their own windows which can be closed, maximized, or moved around.

When you open an app, its window appears on the desktop. Each app typically has three areas: the window buttons, a toolbar, and the contents of the app.

Window Buttons

An app's window buttons are at the top corners of the app window. The close button is on the left and the maximize button is on the right. Pressing the close button will close the app's window. Pressing the maximize button will toggle whether the app window takes up the full screen or not. You can move an app's window around the desktop by dragging empty space between the window buttons.

Toolbar

Many apps have a toolbar at the top of the app. This area contains common actions or navigation items for the app. You can move an app's window around by dragging any blank area of a toolbar.

Multitasking

elementary OS supports two types of multitasking: windows and workspaces.

Windows

Apps open in app windows. They can overlap on your desktop and be moved around. You can switch between windows several ways:

  • click on the window you want to switch to
  • click on the app's icon in the dock
  • press Alt + Tab
To see an overview of your open app wind: Da vidite prikaz svih otvorenih prozora aplikacija, pritisnite kombinaciju <kbd>⌘</kbd> + <kbd>W</kbd>.
You can customize these shortcuts throug: Možete da modifikujete ove prečice preko Sistemske postavke → Tastatura → Prečice → Prozori.
You can also configure &quot;hot corners: Možete da podesite "uglove ekrana" (prečice koje se aktiviraju kada postavite vaš kursor u neki od uglova na ekranu) da biste aktivirali alate za multitasking kao što su prikaz prozora, prikaz radnih površina i slično.
You can customize hot corners through <s: Možete da podesite uglove ekrana kroz Sistemske postavke → Desktop → Uglovi ekrana.
By default, all app windows open on one: Podrazumijevano je da se svi prozori otvaraju na jednoj radnoj površini. Međutim, moguće je koristiti više radnih površina sa ciljem organizovanja vašeg workflow-a:
To see an overview of your workspaces, p: Da vidite prikaz svih vaših radnih površina, pritisnite <kbd>⌘</kbd> + <kbd>S</kbd>.
To quickly move left or right through yo: Da se brzo premjestite ulijevo ili udesno između vaših radnih površina, pritisnite <kbd>⌘</kbd> + <kbd>←</kbd> ili <kbd>⌘</kbd> + <kbd>→</kbd>
To cycle through your workspaces, press: Da se premjestite na sljedeću radnu površinu, pritisnite <kbd>⌘</kbd> + <kbd>Tab</kbd>.
You can jump straight to a specific work: Možete se premjestiti direktno na specifičnu radnu površinu tako što pritisnete tastere od <kbd>⌘</kbd> + <kbd>1</kbd> do <kbd>⌘</kbd> + <kbd>9</kbd>. Da biste kreirali novu radnu površinu, pritisnite <kbd>⌘</kbd> + <kbd>0</kbd>.
You can also drag app windows between wo: Takođe možete i da prevučete prozor aplikacije između radnih površina tako što prevučete njihove ikone u pregledu radnih površina. Da biste otvorili pregled otvorenih prozora na svim radnim površinama, pritisnite <kbd>⌘</kbd> + <kbd>A</kbd>.
You can customize these shortcuts throug: Možete da prilagodite ove prečice otvaranjem Sistemskih postavki → Tastatura → Prečice → Radne površine.
<em>Note: <kbd>&#8984;</kbd> refers to t: Napomena: simbol ⌘ znači "super" tipka. Moguće je da poznajete kao "Windows" tipkom na većini PC uređaja ili kao "Command" tipkom na Mac računarima.
The panel, dock, and workspaces appear o: The panel, dock, and workspaces appear only on the primary display. Any other attached displays act as standalone workspaces. To manage and rearrange displays, head to System Settings → Displays. Your primary display is marked with a filled-in star (
) and each display's settings can be cha: ) and each display's settings can be changed from its cog (
elementary OS comes bundled with <strong: elementary OS dolazi sa vlastitim Softverskim centrom, aplikacijom koja sadrži listu besplatnih aplikacija, kao i listu aplikacija koje se plaćaju. Instaliranje aplikacija kroz Softverski centar je jednostavno:
Click <strong>Install</strong> next to t: Kliknite na Instaliraj pored aplikacije koju želite da instalirate.
You may be asked for your password prior: Moguće je da će sistem zahtijevati od vas da unesete vašu lozinku da biste instalirali aplikaciju.
<em>Note: Some software may not be avail: <em>Pažnja: Postoji mogućnost da neki softver nije dostupan unutar Softverskog centra. Iako ne preporučujemo preuzimanje softvera sa interneta, aplikacije koje su kompatibilne sa Ubuntu 14.04 LTS verzijom bi trebale bez problema da rade i na elementary OS Freya verziji.
elementary OS includes &quot;Software Up: elementary OS includes "Software Update", an easy to use utility for installing app updates and security patches. We recommend you check for updates at least once a week to make sure your computer has the latest features and protection.
For more information related to security: For more information related to security patches, read the Ubuntu security notices.
elementary OS comes with a handy app cal: elementary OS dolazi sa korisnom aplikacijom nazvanom "Postavke sistema" koja kontroliše sva vaša sistemska (ili "globalna") podešavanja. Postavke sistema vam omogućavaju prilagođavanje vašeg korisničkog iskustva kroz prilagođavanje stvari kao što su prečice na tastaturi, rezolucija ekrana, pozadina i još mnogo toga.
You can quickly find settings you are lo: Da biste lako pronaši postavku koju tražite, koristite alatku za pretragu na vrhu prozora. Sadržaj Sistemskih postavki će se automatski filtrirati da vam pokaže stavke koje se podudaraju sa vašom pretragom.
Keep in mind that System Settings only d: Imajte na umu da Sistemske postavke služe samo za mijenjanje globalnih podešavanja vezanih za elementary OS. Iako neke aplikacije mogu da imaju svoje vlastite postavke, nećete ih pronaći ovdje. Umjesto toga, potražite ih unutar aplikacije koju želite da podesite.
